summary: Enhance MkDocs documentation with MkDocs AI Hooks, offering AI-generated summaries and reading statistics. Features include multi-AI service support, multi-language summaries, content cleaning, and efficient caching. Reading statistics feature accurate character counting, code detection, and reading time estimation. The tool supports various programming languages, content types, and offers performance optimization and error handling. Installation can be done via direct download or Git clone, with detailed configuration steps provided. Configure AI summary directories and API for optimal usage.
